verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וַיַּאַסְפ֣וּ <WH622> and they gathered אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him כָּל־ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> unto him all the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king בֵּית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and all the men יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> of Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> with him and the priests וְהַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> and the prophets וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people לְמִקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> both small וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> and great וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and he read בְאָזְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH241> in their ears אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> all the words סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> of the book הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> which was found בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> stood הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> And the king עַֽל־ <WH5921> by הָ֨עַמּ֜וּד <WH5982> by a pillar וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> and made אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִ֣ית ׀ <WH1285> a covenant לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD לָלֶ֜כֶת <WH1980> to walk אַחַ֤ר <WH310> after יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֜יו <WH4687> his commandments וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵדְוֹתָ֤יו <WH5715> and his testimonies וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתָיו֙ <WH2708> and his statutes בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לֵ֣ב <WH3820> with all [their] heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> and all [their] soul לְהָקִ֗ים <WH6965> to perform אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> that הַכְּתֻבִ֖ים <WH3789> that were written עַל־ <WH5921> and הַסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> stood כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people בַּבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> to the covenant

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> חִלְקִיָּהוּ֩ <WH2518> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> the high וְאֶת־ <WH853> כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> and the priests הַמִּשְׁנֶה֮ <WH4932> of the second order וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁמְרֵ֣י <WH8104> and the keepers הַסַּף֒ <WH5592> of the door לְהוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> to bring forth מֵהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> out of the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> all the vessels הָֽעֲשׂוּיִם֙ <WH6213> that were made לַבַּ֣עַל <WH1168> for Baal וְלָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֔ה <WH842> and for the grove וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> and for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַֽיִּשְׂרְפֵ֞ם <WH8313> and he burned מִח֤וּץ <WH2351> them without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> Jerusalem בְּשַׁדְמ֣וֹת <WH7709> in the fields קִדְר֔וֹן <WH6939> of Kidron וְנָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> and carried אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפָרָ֖ם <WH6083> the ashes בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> of them unto Bethel

וְהִשְׁבִּ֣ית <WH7673> And he put down אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּמָרִ֗ים <WH3649> the idolatrous priests אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom נָֽתְנוּ֙ <WH5414> had ordained מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> whom the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיְקַטֵּ֤ר <WH6999> to burn incense בַּבָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> in the high places בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמְסִבֵּ֖י <WH4524> and in the places round about יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמְקַטְּרִ֣ים <WH6999> them also that burned incense לַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> unto Baal לַשֶּׁ֤מֶשׁ <WH8121> to the sun וְלַיָּרֵ֙חַ֙ <WH3394> and to the moon וְלַמַּזָּל֔וֹת <WH4208> and to the planets וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all צְבָ֥א <WH6635> and to all the host הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וַיֹּצֵ֣א <WH3318> And he brought out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרָה֩ <WH842> the grove מִבֵּ֨ית <WH1004> from the house יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִח֤וּץ <WH2351> without לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> to נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the brook קִדְר֔וֹן <WH6939> Kidron וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> and burned אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> it at the brook קִדְר֖וֹן <WH6939> Kidron וַיָּ֣דֶק <WH1854> and stamped [it] small לְעָפָ֑ר <WH6083> to powder וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <WH7993> and cast אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפָרָ֔הּ <WH6083> the powder עַל־ <WH5921> on קֶ֖בֶר <WH6913> thereof upon the graves בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

וַיִּתֹּץ֙ <WH5422> And he brake down אֶת־ <WH853> בָּתֵּ֣י <WH1004> the houses הַקְּדֵשִׁ֔ים <WH6945> of the sodomites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> that [were] by the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הַנָּשִׁ֗ים <WH802> where the women אֹרְג֥וֹת <WH707> wove שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> hangings לָאֲשֵׁרָֽה׃ <WH842> for the grove

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> all the priests מֵעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> out of the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיְטַמֵּ֣א <WH2930> and defiled אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֗וֹת <WH1116> the high places אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which קִטְּרוּ־ <WH6999> had burned incense שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> in it הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> where the priests מִגֶּ֖בַע <WH1387> from Geba עַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> to Beersheba וְנָתַ֞ץ <WH5422> and brake down אֶת־ <WH853> בָּמ֣וֹת <WH1116> the high places הַשְּׁעָרִ֗ים <WH8179> of the gates אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> that [were] in the entering in שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> of the gate יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> of Joshua שַׂר־ <WH8269> the governor הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂמֹ֥אול <WH8040> left hand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> which [were] on a man's בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> at the gate הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

אַ֗ךְ <WH389> Nevertheless לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not יַֽעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> came not up כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> Nevertheless the priests הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> of the high places אֶל־ <WH413> to מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> to the altar יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but אָכְל֥וּ <WH398> but they did eat מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> of the unleavened bread בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> their brethren

וְטִמֵּ֣א <WH2930> And he defiled אֶת־ <WH853> הַתֹּ֔פֶת <WH8612> Topheth אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּגֵ֣י <WH1516> which [is] in the valley [בְנֵי־ כ] (בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <WH2011> of Hinnom ק) לְבִלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> no לְהַעֲבִ֨יר <WH5674> to pass through אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> that no man אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנ֧וֹ <WH1121> might make his son וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּתּ֛וֹ <WH1323> or his daughter בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> the fire לַמֹּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4432> to Molech

וַיַּשְׁבֵּ֣ת <WH7673> And he took away אֶת־ <WH853> הַסּוּסִ֗ים <WH5483> the horses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתְנוּ֩ <WH5414> had given מַלְכֵ֨י <WH4428> that the kings יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah לַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> to the sun מִבֹּ֣א <WH935> at the entering in בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> by לִשְׁכַּת֙ <WH3957> by the chamber נְתַן־ מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH5419> of Nathanmelech הַסָּרִ֔יס <WH5631> the chamberlain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בַּפַּרְוָרִ֑ים <WH6503> which [was] in the suburbs וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַרְכְּב֥וֹת <WH4818> the chariots הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> and burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> הַֽמִּזְבְּח֡וֹת <WH4196> And the altars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגָּג֩ <WH1406> that [were] on the top עֲלִיַּ֨ת <WH5944> of the upper chamber אָחָ֜ז <WH271> of Ahaz אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשׂ֣וּ ׀ <WH6213> had made מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> which the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמִּזְבְּחוֹת֙ <WH4196> and the altars אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> had made מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> which Manasseh בִּשְׁתֵּ֛י <WH8147> in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נָתַ֣ץ <WH5422> beat down הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> did the king וַיָּ֣רָץ <WH7323> and brake [them] down מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וְהִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> from thence and cast אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפָרָ֖ם <WH6083> the dust אֶל־ <WH413> into נַ֥חַל <WH5158> of them into the brook קִדְרֽוֹן׃ <WH6939> Kidron

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֞וֹת <WH1116> And the high places אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [were] before יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> Jerusalem אֲשֶׁר֮ <WH834> which מִימִ֣ין <WH3225> which [were] on the right hand לְהַר־ <WH2022> of the mount הַמַּשְׁחִית֒ <WH4889> of corruption אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּ֠נָה <WH1129> had builded שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <WH8010> which Solomon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel לְעַשְׁתֹּ֣רֶת ׀ <WH6253> for Ashtoreth שִׁקֻּ֣ץ <WH8251> the abomination צִידֹנִ֗ים <WH6722> of the Zidonians וְלִכְמוֹשׁ֙ <WH3645> and for Chemosh שִׁקֻּ֣ץ <WH8251> the abomination מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of the Moabites וּלְמִלְכֹּ֖ם <WH4445> and for Milcom תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> the abomination בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon טִמֵּ֖א <WH2930> defile הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> did the king

וְשִׁבַּר֙ <WH7665> And he brake in pieces אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצֵּב֔וֹת <WH4676> the images וַיִּכְרֹ֖ת <WH3772> and cut down אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרִ֑ים <WH842> the groves וַיְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> and filled אֶת־ <WH853> מְקוֹמָ֖ם <WH4725> their places עַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> with the bones אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men
